DZ_EXPORT DzApp * dzApp

Detailed Description

Defines the DzApp class.

Variable Documentation

DZ_EXPORT DzApp* dzApp

Global pointer to the one and only DzApp. This will be NULL if no application object exists. However, in the course of DAZ Studio execution, it is almost always safe to assume that it points to a valid object since there can be no DzScene object, no main interface, and plug-ins can not be loaded without a valid DzApp object.

This can be used to access the application object anytime it is needed.

Example:
    int i, n = 10;

    dzApp->startProgress( "Doing Something", n );
    for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ){
        // ... do something ...
        dzApp->stepProgress();
    }
    dzApp->finishProgress();
    dzApp->statusLine( "Finished doing something successfully!" );
